column5: A friend of mine has a trip up North planned for late September.He is looking for the 5 Of Diamonds Spinner blades ( size 3-5 Coloraodos) to make up a few worm harnesses but cannot find any, anywheres. He has been using small 5 Of Diamonds casting spoons on walleyes and did really well on an old 5 Of Diamonds harnesse rig he found in a garage sale and last trip out he lost it. If anyone can help out on this, Thanks in advance.
Pete, like the ones pictured below? I buy mine at this site - they're my favorite spinner blade!http://www.luremaking.com/catalogue/...ofDiamonds.htm.
Thanks I was looking for some of this stuff too.
I've bought these blades at Scheel's before.
thanks for the replies. I found 4 different colors in the 5 of Diamonds.These are on EBay now. One question as to what for beads do you guys like with these blades? Thanks.
I have been using large red or silver beads on almost all my rigs lately. They are cheap and easy to put on, compared to the tiny ones.
